citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on 06-JUN-17 at 11:30 a.m..
Spoke to brother of licensee. He stated President of Company is on vacation until 06-12-17.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on 06-JUN-17 at 11:30 a.m..
Spoke to brother of licensee.  He stated President of Company is on vacation until 06-12-17.
